Title: Everything is Beautiful
Plot: The King makes himself head of the Church of England while the Catholic Church fights a losing battle to control Henry VIII's desire for an annulment. Anne Boleyn demands that Henry break off contact with Katherine, so the noble Queen is banished from court. On top of that The Reformation is underway.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Robert Sheehan, Bosco Hogan, Philip O'Sullivan, Aaron Monaghan, Eamon Rohan, Guy Carleton, Tony Mckenna, Gary Murphy, Charlie Bonner, Jason Healy, Luke Hayden, Rebekah Wainwright, Catherine Byrne, Paul Burke
